option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_search_box">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_search" android:tint="@color/skymall_primary_dark" android:tint="@color/skymall_primary_dark" android:tint="@color/skymall_primary_dark" android:tint="@color/skymall_primary_dark" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="Tìm sản phẩm, cửa hàng..." android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:hint="Tìm sản phẩm, cửa hàng..." android:singleLine="true" android:hint="Tìm sản phẩm, cửa hàng..."
android:hint="Tìm sản phẩm, cửa hàng..."

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="40dp" android:orientation="horizontal" android:gravity="center_vertical" android:paddingHorizontal="8dp" android:background="@drawable/bg_search_box">
<ImageView android:layout_width="20dp" android:layout_height="20dp" android:src="@android:drawable/ic_menu_search" app:tint="@color/skymall_primary_dark" android:contentDescription="@string/cd_search_icon" android:layout_marginEnd="6dp" />
<EditText android:id="@+id/etSearch" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:layout_weight="1" android:hint="@string/search_hint" android:background="@android:color/transparent" android:padding="0dp" android:singleLine="true" android:imeOptions="actionSearch" android:inputType="text" android:autofillHints="" android:textSize="14sp" />
</LinearLayout>
